verses.verse: Now there <WG1161> were some <WG5100> present <WG3918> at <WG1722> that <WG846> very season <WG2540> who told <WG518> him <WG846> of <WG4012> the Galilaeans <WG1057>, whose <WG3739> blood <WG129> Pilate <WG4091> had mingled <WG3396> with <WG3326> their <WG846> sacrifices <WG2378>.

And <WG2532> he <WG2424> answered <WG2036> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Think ye <WG1380> that <WG3754> these <WG3778> Galilaeans <WG1057> were <WG1096> sinners <WG268> above <WG3844> all <WG3956> the Galilaeans <WG1057>, because <WG3754> they have suffered <WG3958> these things <WG5108>?
I tell <WG3004> you <WG5213>, Nay <WG3780>: but <WG235>, except1437, 3361 ye repent <WG3340>, ye shall <WG622> all <WG3956> in like <WG5615> manner perish <WG622>.

Or <WG2228> those <WG1565> eighteen <WG1176>, 2532, 3638 upon <WG1722> whom <WG3739> the tower <WG4444> in <WG1909> Siloam <WG4611> fell <WG4098>, and <WG2532> killed <WG615> them <WG846>, think ye <WG1380> that <WG3754> they <WG3778> were <WG1096> offenders <WG3781> above <WG3844> all <WG3956> the men <WG444> that dwell <WG2730> in <WG1722> Jerusalem <WG2419>?

And he spake3004, 1161 this <WG3778> parable <WG3850>; A certain <WG5100> man had <WG2192> a fig tree <WG4808> planted <WG5452> in <WG1722> his <WG846> vineyard <WG290>; and <WG2532> he came <WG2064> seeking <WG2212> fruit2590, 1722 thereon <WG846>, and <WG2532> found <WG2147> none <WG3756>.

And <WG1161> he <WG2036> said unto <WG4314> the vinedresser <WG289>, Behold <WG2400>, these three <WG5140> years <WG2094> I come <WG2064> seeking <WG2212> fruit <WG2590> on <WG1722> this <WG3778> fig tree <WG4808>, and <WG2532> find <WG2147> none <WG3756>: cut <WG1581> it <WG846> down <WG1581>; why <WG2444> doth <WG2532> it <WG3588> also cumber <WG2673> the ground <WG1093>?

And <WG1161> he answering <WG611> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Lord <WG2962>, let <WG863> it <WG846> alone <WG863> this <WG5124> year <WG2094> also <WG2532>, till2193, 3755 I shall dig <WG4626> about <WG4012> it <WG846>, and <WG2532> dung <WG2874> it <WG906>:
and if2579, Ezekiel3 it bear <WG4160> fruit <WG2590> thenceforth <WG1161>, well; but if <WG1487> not <WG3361>, 1519, 3195 thou shalt cut <WG1581> it <WG846> down <WG1581>.
And <WG1161> he was <WG2258> teaching <WG1321> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> of the synagogues <WG4864> on <WG1722> the sabbath day <WG4521>.

And <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, a <WG2258> woman <WG1135> that had <WG2192> a spirit <WG4151> of infirmity <WG769> eighteen1176, 2532, 3638 years <WG2094>; and <WG2532> she was <WG2258> bowed together <WG4794>, and <WG2532> could <WG1410> in <WG1519> no <WG3361> wise <WG3838> lift herself up <WG352>.

And <WG1161> when Jesus <WG2424> saw <WG1492> her <WG846>, he called <WG4377> her <WG2532>, and said <WG2036> to her <WG846>, Woman <WG1135>, thou art loosed <WG630> from thine <WG4675> infirmity <WG769>.
And <WG2532> he laid <WG2007> his hands <WG5495> upon her <WG846>: and <WG2532> immediately <WG3916> she was made straight <WG461>, and <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> God <WG2316>.

And <WG1161> the ruler of the synagogue <WG752>, being moved with indignation <WG23> because <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> had healed <WG2323> on the sabbath <WG4521>, answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to the multitude <WG3793>, There are <WG1526> six <WG1803> days <WG2250> in <WG1722> which men <WG3739> ought <WG1163> to work <WG2038>: in <WG1722> them <WG3778> therefore <WG3767> come <WG2064> and be healed <WG2323>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> on the day <WG2250> of the sabbath <WG4521>.

But the Lord2962, 3767 answered <WG611> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, Ye hypocrites <WG5273>, doth <WG3089> not <WG3756> each one <WG1538> of you <WG5216> on the sabbath <WG4521> loose <WG3089> his <WG846> ox <WG1016> or <WG2228> his ass <WG3688> from <WG575> the stall <WG5336>, and <WG2532> lead <WG520> him away <WG520> to watering <WG4222>?

And <WG1161> ought <WG1163> not <WG3756> this woman <WG3778>, being <WG5607> a daughter <WG2364> of Abraham <WG11>, whom <WG3739> Satan <WG4567> had bound <WG1210>, lo <WG2400>, these eighteen1176, 2532, 3638 years <WG2094>, to have been loosed <WG3089> from <WG575> this <WG5127> bond <WG1199> on the day <WG2250> of the sabbath <WG4521>?

And <WG2532> as he <WG846> said <WG3004> these things <WG5023>, all <WG3956> his <WG846> adversaries <WG480> were put to shame <WG2617>: and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the multitude <WG3793> rejoiced <WG5463> for <WG1909> all <WG3956> the glorious <WG1741> things that <WG3588> were done <WG1096> by <WG5259> him <WG846>.
He <WG3004> said therefore <WG1161>, Unto what <WG5101> is <WG2076> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> like <WG3664>? and <WG2532> whereunto <WG5101> shall I liken <WG3666> it <WG846>?

It is <WG2076> like <WG3664> unto a grain <WG2848> of mustard seed <WG4615>, which <WG3739> a man <WG444> took <WG2983>, and <WG2532> cast <WG906> into <WG1519> his <WG1438> own garden <WG2779>; and <WG2532> it grew <WG837>, and <WG2532> became1096, 1519 a tree <WG1186>; and <WG2532> the birds <WG4071> of the heaven <WG3772> lodged <WG2681> in <WG1722> the branches <WG2798> thereof <WG846>.

It is <WG2076> like <WG3664> unto leaven <WG2219>, which <WG3739> a woman <WG1135> took <WG2983> and hid <WG1470> in <WG1519> three <WG5140> measures <WG4568> of meal <WG224>, till <WG2193> it <WG3739> was all <WG3650> leavened <WG2220>.
And <WG2532> he went <WG1279> on his way through <WG2596> cities <WG4172> and <WG2532> villages <WG2968>, teaching <WG1321>, and <WG2532> journeying4160, 4197 on unto <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2419>.
And <WG1161> one <WG5100> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Lord <WG2962>, are they <WG1487> few <WG3641> that <WG3588> are saved <WG4982>? And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>,

Strive <WG75> to enter in <WG1525> by <WG1223> the narrow <WG4728> door <WG4439>: for <WG3754> many <WG4183>, I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, shall seek <WG2212> to enter in <WG1525>, and <WG2532> shall <WG2480> not <WG3756> be able <WG2480>.

When <WG575> once3739, Leviticus2 the master of the house <WG3617> is risen up <WG1453>, and <WG2532> hath shut to <WG608> the door <WG2374>, and <WG2532> ye begin <WG756> to stand <WG2476> without <WG1854>, and <WG2532> to knock <WG2925> at the door <WG2374>, saying <WG3004>, Lord <WG2962>, <WG2962> open <WG455> to us <WG2254>; and <WG2532> he shall answer <WG611> and say <WG2046> to you <WG5213>, I know <WG1492> you <WG5209> not <WG3756> whence <WG4159> ye are <WG2075>;

then <WG5119> shall ye begin <WG756> to say <WG3004>, We did eat <WG5315> and <WG2532> drink <WG4095> in thy <WG4675> presence <WG1799>, and <WG2532> thou didst teach <WG1321> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> streets <WG4113>;

and <WG2532> he shall say <WG2046>, I tell <WG3004> you <WG5213>, I know1492, Romans9 not <WG3756> whence <WG4159> ye are <WG2075>; depart <WG868> from <WG575> me <WG1700>, all <WG3956> ye workers <WG2040> of iniquity <WG93>.

There <WG1563> shall be <WG2071> the weeping <WG2805> and <WG2532> the gnashing <WG1030> of teeth <WG3599>, when <WG3752> ye shall see <WG3700> Abraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> Isaac <WG2464>, and <WG2532> Jacob <WG2384>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the prophets <WG4396>, in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316>, and <WG1161> yourselves <WG5209> cast <WG1544> forth without <WG1854>.

And <WG2532> they shall come <WG2240> from <WG575> the east <WG395> and <WG2532> west <WG1424>, and <WG2532> from <WG575> the north <WG1005> and <WG2532> south <WG3558>, and <WG2532> shall sit down <WG347> in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, there are <WG1526> last <WG2078> who <WG3739> shall be <WG2071> first <WG4413>, and <WG2532> there are <WG1526> first <WG4413> who <WG3739> shall be <WG2071> last <WG2078>.

In that very <WG846> hour <WG2250> there came <WG4334> certain <WG5100> Pharisees <WG5330>, saying <WG3004> to him <WG846>, Get thee out <WG1831>, and <WG2532> go <WG4198> hence <WG1782>: for <WG3754> Herod <WG2264> would <WG2309> fain kill <WG615> thee <WG4571>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Go <WG4198> and say <WG2036> to that <WG3778> fox <WG258>, Behold <WG2400>, I cast out <WG1544> demons <WG1140> and <WG2532> perform <WG2005> cures <WG2392> to-day <WG4594> and <WG2532> to-morrow <WG839>, and <WG2532> the third <WG5154> day I am perfected <WG5048>.

Nevertheless <WG4133> I <WG3165> must <WG1163> go <WG4198> on my way to-day <WG4594> and <WG2532> to-morrow <WG839> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> day following <WG2192>: for <WG3754> it <WG1735> cannot <WG3756> be <WG1735> that a prophet <WG4396> perish <WG622> out of <WG1854> Jerusalem <WG2419>.

O Jerusalem <WG2419>, Jerusalem <WG2419>, that <WG3588> killeth <WG615> the prophets <WG4396>, and <WG2532> stoneth <WG3036> them that <WG3588> are sent <WG649> unto <WG4314> her <WG846>! how often <WG4212> would <WG2309> I have gathered <WG1996> thy <WG4675> children <WG5043> together <WG1996>, even as <WG3739> a <WG5158> hen <WG3733> gathereth her <WG1438> own brood <WG3555> under <WG5259> her wings <WG4420>, and <WG2532> ye would <WG2309> not <WG3756>!

Behold <WG2400>, your <WG5216> house <WG3624> is left <WG863> unto you <WG5213> desolate <WG2048>: and1161, 281 I say <WG3004> unto you <WG3754>, Ye shall1492, 3361 not <WG3756> see <WG1492> me <WG3165>, until2193, Leviticus2, 2240, 3753 ye shall say <WG2036>, Blessed <WG2127> is he that <WG3588> cometh <WG2240> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of the Lord <WG2962>.
